name: Russian Truck Simulator 2020 Beta
description:
Russian Truck Simulator 2020 - is new project of Gromov Technologies on unreal engine 4.

It's inovation simulator with realistic physics and good graphics about trucker on Russian roads. You have Truck and big open world.  You can transport cargo or chase out police.

Final version of this simulator will be released on 2020. If you will buy beta version, you will give free release version (keys for markets).
